description: Joel Thomas, 31, of Festus, Missouri, got the tattoo after an accident left his son Landon, 9, with burn scars on his right leg and foot.
maintext: Joel Thomas, 31, of Festus, Missouri, got the tattoo after an accident left his son Landon, 9, with burn scars on his right leg and foot.
title: Man gets replica tattoo of son's burn scars
